name: cargo_nextest
description: Run tests with cargo-nextest run command.

hints.default: Running tests with nextest... a good moment to review your test coverage.

subcommand.name: nextest
subcommand.description:
**IMPORTANT:** This tool operates asynchronously.
1. **Immediate Response:** Returns operation_id and status 'started'. NOT success.
2. **Final Result:** Result pushed automatically via MCP notification when complete.

**Your Instructions:**
- **DO NOT** await for the final result.
- **DO** continue with other tasks that don't depend on this operation.
- You **MUST** process the future result notification to know if operation succeeded.

Run tests using cargo nextest.

subcommand.name: run
subcommand.description: Run tests using nextest. Operates asynchronously - returns operation_id immediately, results delivered via notification when complete. Continue with other tasks.

options.name: color
options.description: Produce color output: auto, always, never [env: CARGO_TERM_COLOR=] [default: auto]

options.name: tool-config-file
options.description: Tool-specific config files in the format 'tool:abs_path'. May be specified multiple times; later files are lower priority.

options.name: override-version-check
options.description: Override checks for the minimum version defined in nextest's config

options.name: profile
options.description: The nextest profile to use [env: NEXTEST_PROFILE=]

options.name: workspace
options.description: Run tests for all packages in workspace
